title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation
text: Chakraborty (2024). clintrialx: Connect work clinical trials data sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via live APIs. R package version 0.1.0, http://ineelhere.github.io/clintrialx/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {clintrialx: Connect and work with clinical trials data from sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via their live APIs},   author = {Indraneel Chakraborty},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {http://ineelhere.github.io/clintrialx/}, }

what: Connect and work with clinical trials data from sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via their live APIs
title: Connect and work with clinical trials data from sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via their live APIs
text: goal clintrialx fetch clinical trials data freely available registries. Currently, supports ClinicalTrials.gov registry using V2 API.

title: Connect and work with clinical trials data from sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via their live APIs
Connect and work with clinical trials data from sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via their live APIs
text: basic example shows download data based NCT ID(s): Fetch /specific fields: can also download data multiple NCT IDs: Similarly, can query desired fields:
code: library(clintrialx) #> Loading required package: httr #> Loading required package: lubridate #>  #> Attaching package: 'lubridate' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     date, intersect, setdiff, union #> Loading required package: readr #> Loading required package: dplyr #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union #> Loading required package: progress fetch_specific_trial_data("NCT04000165") #> # A tibble: 1 Ã— 30 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`  `Study URL` Acronym `Study Status` `Brief Summary` #>   <chr>        <chr>          <chr>       <chr>   <chr>          <chr>           #> 1 NCT04000165  A Dose-Findinâ€¦ https://clâ€¦ <NA>    COMPLETED      "Background:\nâ€¦ #> # â„¹ 24 more variables: `Study Results` <chr>, Conditions <chr>, #> #   Interventions <chr>, `Primary Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   `Secondary Outcome Measures` <chr>, `Other Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   Sponsor <chr>, Collaborators <chr>, Sex <chr>, Age <chr>, Phases <chr>, #> #   Enrollment <chr>, `Funder Type` <chr>, `Study Type` <chr>, #> #   `Study Design` <chr>, `Other IDs` <chr>, `Start Date` <chr>, #> #   `Primary Completion Date` <chr>, `Completion Date` <chr>, â€¦ library(clintrialx) fetch_specific_trial_data("NCT04000165", fields = c("NCT Number", "Study Title", "Study Status", "Sponsor")) #> # A tibble: 1 Ã— 4 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`                              `Study Status` Sponsor #>   <chr>        <chr>                                      <chr>          <chr>   #> 1 NCT04000165  A Dose-Finding Study of AG-348 in Sickle â€¦ COMPLETED      Nationâ€¦ library(clintrialx) fetch_specific_trial_data(c("NCT02967965", "NCT04000165", "NCT01007279", "NCT02376244", "NCT01179776")) #> [=================>--------------------------] 2/5 ( 40%) Fetching #> NCT04000165[=========================>------------------] 3/5 ( 60%) Fetching #> NCT01007279[==================================>---------] 4/5 ( 80%) Fetching #> NCT02376244[============================================] 5/5 (100%) Fetching #> NCT01179776 #> # A tibble: 5 Ã— 30 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`  `Study URL` Acronym `Study Status` `Brief Summary` #>   <chr>        <chr>          <chr>       <chr>   <chr>          <chr>           #> 1 NCT02967965  CARdioprotectâ€¦ https://clâ€¦ CARIM   ACTIVE_NOT_REâ€¦ "CARIM is a prâ€¦ #> 2 NCT04000165  A Dose-Findinâ€¦ https://clâ€¦ <NA>    COMPLETED      "Background:\nâ€¦ #> 3 NCT01007279  Rosuvastatin â€¦ https://clâ€¦ ROMA    COMPLETED      "An increase iâ€¦ #> 4 NCT02376244  The Health Imâ€¦ https://clâ€¦ <NA>    COMPLETED      "Cardiac rehabâ€¦ #> 5 NCT01179776  Ilomedin Treaâ€¦ https://clâ€¦ <NA>    COMPLETED      "Acute myocardâ€¦ #> # â„¹ 24 more variables: `Study Results` <chr>, Conditions <chr>, #> #   Interventions <chr>, `Primary Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   `Secondary Outcome Measures` <chr>, `Other Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   Sponsor <chr>, Collaborators <chr>, Sex <chr>, Age <chr>, Phases <chr>, #> #   Enrollment <chr>, `Funder Type` <chr>, `Study Type` <chr>, #> #   `Study Design` <chr>, `Other IDs` <chr>, `Start Date` <chr>, #> #   `Primary Completion Date` <chr>, `Completion Date` <chr>, â€¦ library(clintrialx) fetch_specific_trial_data(c("NCT02967965", "NCT04000165", "NCT01007279", "NCT02376244", "NCT01179776"),                           fields = c("NCT Number", "Study Title", "Study Status", "Sponsor")) #> [=================>--------------------------] 2/5 ( 40%) Fetching #> NCT04000165[=========================>------------------] 3/5 ( 60%) Fetching #> NCT01007279[==================================>---------] 4/5 ( 80%) Fetching #> NCT02376244[============================================] 5/5 (100%) Fetching #> NCT01179776 #> # A tibble: 5 Ã— 4 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`                              `Study Status` Sponsor #>   <chr>        <chr>                                      <chr>          <chr>   #> 1 NCT02967965  CARdioprotection in Myocardial Infarction  ACTIVE_NOT_REâ€¦ EZUS-Lâ€¦ #> 2 NCT04000165  A Dose-Finding Study of AG-348 in Sickle â€¦ COMPLETED      Nationâ€¦ #> 3 NCT01007279  Rosuvastatin in Preventing Myonecrosis inâ€¦ COMPLETED      Univerâ€¦ #> 4 NCT02376244  The Health Impact of High Intensity Exercâ€¦ COMPLETED      Liverpâ€¦ #> 5 NCT01179776  Ilomedin Treatment for Patients Having Unâ€¦ COMPLETED      Thrombâ€¦

title: Connect and work with clinical trials data from sources like ClinicalTrials.Gov via their live APIs
text: can fetch version information directly package:
code: library(clintrialx) version_info(source = "clinicaltrials.gov") #> Clinicaltrials.gov API version: 2.0.3 #> Timestamp: 2024-07-19 11:12:14

what: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID â€” fetch_specific_trial_data
title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID â€” fetch_specific_trial_data
text: Retrieves data one clinical trials ClinicalTrials.gov API based NCT ID(s).

title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID â€” fetch_specific_trial_data
Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID â€” fetch_specific_trial_data
text: nct_ids character vector one NCT IDs (e.g., "NCT04000165") clinical trials fetch. fields character vector specifying fields retrieve. NULL (default), available fields fetched. specified, must subset available fields.

title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID â€” fetch_specific_trial_data
text: tibble containing clinical trial data columns matching requested fields.

title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID â€” fetch_specific_trial_data
text: function allows specify one NCT IDs optionally select specific fields interest. fetches relevant data returns tibble. function constructs request NCT ID, specifying desired fields. uses progress bar show progress fetching data multiple trials. data returned tibble columns corresponding requested fields. fetches fail API response contains columns requested, warnings issued. Ensure fields parameter contains valid field names specified guide . Invalid fields result error.

title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID â€” fetch_specific_trial_data
text: following available fields can request ClinicalTrials.gov:   NCT Number,   Study Title,   Study URL,   Acronym,   Study Status,   Brief Summary,   Study Results,   Conditions,   Interventions,   Primary Outcome Measures,   Secondary Outcome Measures,   Outcome Measures,   Sponsor,   Collaborators,   Sex,   Age,   Phases,   Enrollment,   Funder Type,   Study Type,   Study Design,   IDs,   Start Date,   Primary Completion Date,   Completion Date,   First Posted,   Results First Posted,   Last Update Posted,   Locations,   Study Documents

title: Fetch Clinical Trial Data Based on NCT ID â€” fetch_specific_trial_data
code: # Fetch data for a single NCT ID trial_data <- fetch_specific_trial_data("NCT04000165") trial_data #> # A tibble: 1 Ã— 30 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`  `Study URL` Acronym `Study Status` `Brief Summary` #>   <chr>        <chr>          <chr>       <chr>   <chr>          <chr>           #> 1 NCT04000165  A Dose-Findinâ€¦ https://clâ€¦ NA      COMPLETED      "Background:\nâ€¦ #> # â„¹ 24 more variables: `Study Results` <chr>, Conditions <chr>, #> #   Interventions <chr>, `Primary Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   `Secondary Outcome Measures` <chr>, `Other Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   Sponsor <chr>, Collaborators <chr>, Sex <chr>, Age <chr>, Phases <chr>, #> #   Enrollment <chr>, `Funder Type` <chr>, `Study Type` <chr>, #> #   `Study Design` <chr>, `Other IDs` <chr>, `Start Date` <chr>, #> #   `Primary Completion Date` <chr>, `Completion Date` <chr>, â€¦  # Fetch data for multiple NCT IDs multiple_trials <- fetch_specific_trial_data(c("NCT04000165", "NCT04002440")) multiple_trials #> # A tibble: 2 Ã— 30 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`  `Study URL` Acronym `Study Status` `Brief Summary` #>   <chr>        <chr>          <chr>       <chr>   <chr>          <chr>           #> 1 NCT04000165  A Dose-Findinâ€¦ https://clâ€¦ NA      COMPLETED      "Background:\nâ€¦ #> 2 NCT04002440  Directed Use â€¦ https://clâ€¦ DREAM-â€¦ ACTIVE_NOT_REâ€¦ "Among ambulatâ€¦ #> # â„¹ 24 more variables: `Study Results` <chr>, Conditions <chr>, #> #   Interventions <chr>, `Primary Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   `Secondary Outcome Measures` <chr>, `Other Outcome Measures` <chr>, #> #   Sponsor <chr>, Collaborators <chr>, Sex <chr>, Age <chr>, Phases <chr>, #> #   Enrollment <chr>, `Funder Type` <chr>, `Study Type` <chr>, #> #   `Study Design` <chr>, `Other IDs` <chr>, `Start Date` <chr>, #> #   `Primary Completion Date` <chr>, `Completion Date` <chr>, â€¦  # Fetch data for multiple NCT IDs with specific fields specific_fields <- fetch_specific_trial_data(   c("NCT04000165", "NCT04002440"),   fields = c("NCT Number", "Study Title", "Study Status") ) specific_fields #> # A tibble: 2 Ã— 3 #>   `NCT Number` `Study Title`                                      `Study Status` #>   <chr>        <chr>                                              <chr>          #> 1 NCT04000165  A Dose-Finding Study of AG-348 in Sickle Cell Disâ€¦ COMPLETED      #> 2 NCT04002440  Directed Use of REmote Patient Management System â€¦ ACTIVE_NOT_REâ€¦

what: Get API Version Information â€” version_info
title: Get API Version Information â€” version_info
text: function retrieves version information specified clinical trials API sources.

title: Get API Version Information â€” version_info
Get API Version Information â€” version_info
text: source character string specifying source query. Currently, "clinicaltrials.gov" supported.

title: Get API Version Information â€” version_info
text: Prints API version data timestamp successful. Otherwise, prints error message.

title: Get API Version Information â€” version_info
code: version_info() #> Clinicaltrials.gov API version: 2.0.3 #> Timestamp: 2024-07-19 11:12:14 version_info("clinicaltrials.gov") #> Clinicaltrials.gov API version: 2.0.3 #> Timestamp: 2024-07-19 11:12:14
